Spells-Primal -- Male Half-Orc Druid: 12
Strength: 16 (+3) Dexterity: 16 (+3) Constitution: 16 (+3) Intelligence: 16 (+3) Wisdom: 16 (+3) Charisma: 14 (+2)
Background: Acrobat Alignment: Lawful Good Deity: Sarenrae (NG)
Experience: 11474/12000 Level: 12 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 8/13
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 3; Class: 7; General: 3; Skill: 6 Selectable Feature Count: Druid (Order); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Additional Lore (Cavern Lore); Additional Lore (Games Lore); Adopted Ancestry (Elf); Assurance (Diplomacy); Call Of The Wild; Cooperative Nature; Cooperative Soul; Experienced Professional; Fey Caller; Group Impression; Hobnobber; Order Explorer (Wild); Overwhelming Energy; Quick Squeeze; Reach Spell; Skill Training (Religion); Steady Spellcasting; Unconventional Weaponry (Halberd); Widen Spell Druid Features: Ability Boost (Wisdom); Ability Boosts; Alertness; Anathema; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense); Druid Feats; Druid Skills; Druid Weapon Expertise; Druidic Language; Druidic Order; Expert Spellcaster; General Feats; Great Fortitude; Leaf; Lightning Reflexes; Perception Trained; Primal Spellcasting; Resolve; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Shield Block; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Spell Trained (Primal); Wild Empathy Acrobat Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Dexterity, Strength; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Acrobatics; Circus Lore); Steady Balance Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Orc; Human Heritage
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 3 selections
Druid Feats: 6 selections
Druidic Order: 1 selection
General Feats: 3 selections
Half-Orc: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Leaf: Has the Leshy Familiar feature/+1 Focus Points
Order Explorer (Wild): +1 Class Feat
Skill Feats: 6 selections
Adopted Ancestry (Elf): May take Elf ancestry feats
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by druidic order
Half-Orc: Has the orc trait and may take orc and half-orc feats
Leshy Familiar: Has a Tiny plant or fungus familiar
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Order Explorer (Wild): Can select Wild order feats
Perception: +19 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +17 (dexterity; trained) Diplomacy: +16 (charisma; trained) Occultism: +3 (intelligence; untrained)
Arcana: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Forest Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +2 (charisma; untrained)
Athletics: +3 (strength; untrained) Games Lore: +21 (intelligence; master) Religion: +17 (wisdom; trained)
Baking Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +16 (charisma; trained) Society: +3 (intelligence; untrained)
Cavern Lore: +21 (intelligence; master) Legal Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Stealth: +3 (dexterity; untrained)
Circus Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Library Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +3 (wisdom; untrained)
Crafting: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +17 (wisdom; trained) Tea Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained)
Deception: +2 (charisma; untrained) Military Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Thievery: +3 (dexterity; untrained)
Desert Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Nature: +17 (wisdom; trained) Warfare Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained)
Languages: Abyssal; Common; Druidic; Gnomish; Halfling; Necril
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Cavern Lore): Skill Master (Cavern Lore)
Additional Lore (Games Lore): Skill Master (Games Lore)
Alertness: Perception Expert
Druid Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Choose 5 from any)
Druidic Language: Knows a druid-specific language
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Leaf: Skill Trained (Diplomacy)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 5 from any)
Skill Training (Religion): Skill Trained (Religion)
Assurance (Diplomacy): Can take an automatic 24 on Diplomacy checks
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures to Aid with expert skills are successes
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Group Impression: Can use Diplomacy to Make An Impression with 2 targets
Hobnobber: Can Gather Information in half the normal time
Quick Squeeze: Can Squeeze 5' per rd, or 10' per rd on a critical success
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Balance does not inflict flat-footed/Can use Acrobatics to Grab An Edge
Wild Empathy: Can use Diplomacy with animals to Make An Impression and to make simple Requests
Combat
Hit Points: 140 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity (5 max); trained)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Blowgun (+19 1 P R20'; dexterity; expert); Mace (+19 1d6+3 B; strength; expert); Sickle (+19 1d4+3 S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +36
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Druid Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Halberd): Weapon Familiarity (Halberd)
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +19 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +19 (dexterity; expert); Will: +21 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: P1: 3; P2: 3; P3: 3; P4: 3; P5: 3; P6: 3; PC1: 5 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Primal: +19 (wisdom; expert) Spell DC: Primal: 29 (wisdom; expert)
Spells:
Aberrant Whispers (P3 Foc Enc): (1) 5' emanation (2 or 3 actions give a 10' or 15' emanation) inflicts stupefied 2 (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts confused) (heightened +3 increases the radius by 5')
Abyssal Wrath (P5 Foc Evo): (2) 60' cone inflicts 4d6 HP each of a random pair of damage types: bludgeoning and electricity; acid and slashing; bludgeoning and cold; fire and piercing (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP each)
Acid Arrow (P2 Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 3d8 HP acid, or double HP on a critical success, plus 1d6 HP persistent acid (heightened +2 inflicts +2d8 HP initial and +1d6 HP persistent)
Acid Splash (PC1 Evo): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d6 HP acid, plus 1 HP persistent acid on a critical success, and 1 HP acid splash (heightened 3rd inflicts 1d6+3 HP initial and 2 HP persistent; 5th inflicts 2d6+3 HP initial, 3 HP persistent, and 2 HP splash; 7th inflicts 3d6+3 HP initial, 4 HP persistent, and 3 HP splash; 9th inflicts 4d6+3 HP initial, 5 HP persistent, and 4 HP splash)
Aerial Form (P4 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Medium bat, bird, pterosaur, or wasp with 5 temporary HP, Armor Class 30, +16 attack, +5 damage, low-light vision, flight, +16 Acrobatics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 5th becomes a Large creature with +10' Speed, 10 temporary HP, +18 attack, +8 damage, +20 Acrobatics; 6th becomes a Huge creature with +15' Speed, 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 33, +21 attack, +4 damage with double damage dice, +23 Acrobatics)
Air Bubble (P1 Con): (R) R60' Allows target to breathe normally in any environment for 1 min
Air Walk (P4 Tra): (2) Touched can walk up to a 45-degree angle on air for 5 min
Alarm (P1 Abj): (10 min) 20' burst triggers a mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying a specified password for 8 hr (heightened 3rd allows specifying characteristics of triggering creatures)
Ancestral Memories (P1 Foc Div): (1) Self becomes trained in a non-Lore or ancestral Lore skill for 1 min (heightened 6th becomes expert in the skill)
Angelic Halo (P1 Foc Abj): (1) 15' emanation increases the HP restored by Heal by double the Heal spell's level for 1 min
Angelic Wings (P3 Foc Evo): (2) Self gains a 25' fly Speed and shines a 30' radius bright light for 3 rd (heightened 5th effects last for 1 min)
Animal Form (P2 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Medium animal with 5 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +9 attack, +1 damage, low-light vision, 30' imprecise scent, +9 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 3rd gives 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 29, +14 attack, +5 damage, +14 Athletics; 4th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 30, +16 attack, +9 damage, +16 Athletics; 5th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, Armor Class 30, +18 attack, +7 damage with double damage dice, +20 Athletics)
Animal Messenger (P2 Enc): (1 min) R120' Target Tiny animal carries a small object or note to a specified destination for up to 24 hr
Animal Vision (P3 Div): (1 min) R120' Allows self to share the target animal's senses (save Will negates) for 1 hr
Ant Haul (P1 Tra): (2) Touched can carry +3 Bulk without encumbrance and +6 Bulk maximum for 8 hr
Arcane Countermeasure (P5 Foc Abj): (R) R120' Reduces the triggering spell's heightened level by 1 and gives the spell's targets +2 saves, skill checks, Armor Class, and DC against it
Baleful Polymorph (P6 Tra): (2) R30' Transforms the target's form into a harmless animal for 1 min, allowing a new save to revert each rd (save Will inflicts minor physical changes and sickened 1; critical success negates; critical failure transforms permanently and also affects the target's mind)
Banishment (P5 Abj): (2) R30' Returns the target to its home plane (save Will (-2 if cast using an additional action and a target anathema) negates; critical success inflicts stunned 1 on self; critical failure prevents the target's return for 1 week) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Barkskin (P2 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 2 to bludgeoning and piercing and weakness 3 to fire for 10 min or until dismissed by target (heightened +2 gives +2 resistances and +3 weakness)
Blindness (P3 Nec): (2) R30' Blinds the target for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent blindness)
Burning Hands (P1 Evo): (2) 15' cone inflicts 2d6 HP fire (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Cataclysm (P10 Evo): (2) R1000' 60' burst inflicts 3d10 HP each acid, bludgeoning 3 times, cold, electricity, and fire, ignoring resistance 10 (save basic Reflex)
Celestial Brand (P5 Foc Nec): (1) R30' Self and allies gain +1 attacks and skill checks vs. the evil target, and attacks by good creatures inflict +1d4 HP good, for 1 rd (heightened +2 good creature attacks inflict +1 HP)
Chain Lightning (P6 Evo): (2) R500' Inflicts 8d12 HP electricity on a chain of targets, jumping up to 30' between each (save basic Reflex; critical success ends the chain) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Charm (P1 Enc): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions against self for 1 hr (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful) (heightened 4th effects last until next daily prep; heightened 8th effects last until next daily prep and affect 10 targets)
Cloudkill (P5 Nec): (3) R120' Creates a cloud in a 20' burst that inflicts 6d8 HP poison and moves away 10' each rd for 1 min (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)

Darkvision (P2 Div): (2) Allows self to see in darkness for 1 hr (heightened 3rd affects a touched target; 5th effects last until next daily prep)
Deafness (P2 Nec): (2) R30' Inflicts deafness for 10 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent deafness)
Death Ward (P5 Abj): (2) Touched gains +4 saves vs. death and negative effects, negative resistance 10, and suppressed doomed effects for 10 min

Detect Poison (P1 Div): (2) R30' Reveals whether the target creature or object is venomous or poisoned (heightened 2nd reveals the number and types of poison)

Disjunction (P9 Abj): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to deactivate a non-artifact magic item; critical success destroys it
Dispel Magic (P2 Abj): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to remove 1 spell effect from the target or to make a magic item inert for 10 min

Dragon Form (P6 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Large dragon with 40' Speed, 100' fly Speed, 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 30, +22 attack, +6 damage, a breath weapon, resistance 10 to the breath weapon damage type, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, +23 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 8th becomes a Huge creature with 120' fly Speed, +5' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 33, +28 attack, +12 damage (breath weapon +14), +28 Athletics)

Earthbind (P3 Tra): (2) R120' Brings a flying target to the ground and prevents flight and levitation for 1 rd (save Fortitude grounds target but does not prevent flight; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 min)
Earthquake (P8 Evo): (2) R500' 60' burst inflicts difficult terrain, -2 attacks, Armor Class, and skill checks, a 40' fall (save Reflex negates), and structure collapse that inflicts 11d6 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (save Reflex inflicts half HP and knocked prone; critical success inflicts half HP only; critical failure causes the fall save to fail) (heightened 10th increases range to a half mile and effect area to a quarter-mile burst)
Eclipse Burst (P7 Nec): (2) R500' 60' burst attempts to counteract magical light and inflicts 8d10 HP cold, plus 8d4 HP negative to living creatures (save Reflex; inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP cold and +1d4 HP negative)

Fiery Body (P7 Tra): (2) Self gains fire immunity and resistance 10 to precision damage, suffers weakness 5 to cold and water, inflicts 3d6 HP fire on non-reach melee attackers, inflicts +1d4 HP fire on unarmed attacks and an additional die of damage on fire spells, can cast Produce Flame using 1 action as an innate spell, gains a 40' fly Speed, and does not need to breathe for 1 min (heightened 9th inflicts 4d6 HP fire on non-reach melee attackers, inflicts +2d4 HP fire on unarmed attacks, and increases fly Speed to 60')

Goblin Pox (P1 Nec): (2) Touched suffers stage 1 goblin pox, which inflicts sickened 1 for 1 rd; subsequent failures after 1 rd will inflict sickened 1 and slowed 1 for 1 rd at stage 2, and incurably sickened 1 for 1 dy at stage 3 (save Fortitude inflicts sickened 1 only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 2; goblins and goblin dogs are immune)

Grease (P1 Con): (2) R30' 4 5' squares cause falls, or 1 target object inflicts a -2 penalty to checks, for 1 min (save Reflex or Acrobatics negates; critical failure causes the holder to drop the target object)
Guidance (PC1 Div): (1) R30' Target gains +1 on an attack, Perception, save, or skill check within 1 rd once per target per hr
Gust Of Wind (P1 Evo): (2) 60' line extinguishes small, non-magical fires, disperses fog, moves light objects, and knocks prone creatures up to Large for 1 rd (save Fortitude prevents moving against the wind but does not knock prone; critical success negates; critical failure pushes 30', knocks prone, and inflicts 2d6 HP bludgeoning)
Hallucinatory Terrain (P4 Ill): (10 min) R500' 50' burst illusion changes the look, sound, feel, and smell of the terrain until next daily prep (heightened 5th the illusion can mask or incorporate structures)
Haste (P3 Tra): (2) R30' Target gains an extra Strike or Stride action each rd for 1 min (heightened 7th affects 6 targets)
Heal (P1 Nec): (1) Touched (2 or 3 actions gives R30' or a 30' emanation) regains 1d8 HP, or 1d8+8 HP with 2 actions; undead instead suffer 1d8 HP (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 restores or inflicts +1d8 HP; restores +8 HP with 2 actions)
Heal Animal (P1 Foc Nec): (1) Touched animal (2 actions gives R30') regains 1d8 HP, or 1d8+8 HP with 2 actions (heightened +1 restores +1d8 HP or +1d8+8 HP)
Hellfire Plume (P5 Foc Evo): (2) R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP evil (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP fire and evil)
Horrid Wilting (P8 Nec): (2) Targets in a 500' radius suffer 10d10 HP negative (save basic Fortitude; plant and water creatures worsen save by 1 degree) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Horrific Visage (P3 Foc Ill): (2) 30' radius inflicts frightened 1 (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 2) (heightened 5th inflicts frightened 1, 2, or 3 and fleeing for 1 rd on save success, failure, or critical failure)
Humanoid Form (P2 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Small or Medium humanoid and gains +4 Deception to pass as the chosen ancestry for 10 min (heightened 3rd gives darkvision or low-light vision if appropriate to the ancestry; 5th becomes a Large humanoid)
Hydraulic Push (P1 Evo): (2) R60' Spell attack inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning and a 5' push, or 6d6 HP bludgeoning and a 10' push with a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Hydraulic Torrent (P4 Evo): (2) 60' line inflicts 8d6 HP bludgeoning and a 5' push (save basic Fortitude; success negates push; critical failure doubles push distance)
Illusory Disguise (P1 Ill): (2) Makes self appear different and gives +16 Deception to avoid uncovering the disguise for 1 hr (heightened 2nd also disguises voice and scent; 3rd allows copying a specific individual)
Illusory Object (P1 Ill): (2) R500' Creates an image of a stationary object in a 20' burst for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects include sounds and smells and last for 1 hr; 5th effects are permanent)
Illusory Scene (P5 Ill): (10 min) R500' Creates in a 30' burst a moving illusion with up to 10 creatures or objects, sounds, and smells for 1 hr (heightened 6th creatures in the scene can speak; 8th effects are permanent)
Impaling Briars (P8 Foc Con): (2) 100' emanation inflicts difficult terrain, -10 Speed (save Reflex negates; critical failure inflicts immobilized for 1 rd), or greater difficult terrain, plus 10d6 HP piercing and -10' Speed on a target with a successful spell attack (or immobilized with a critical success), each rd while sustained for up to 1 min
Implosion (P9 Evo): (2) R30' Inflicts 75 HP on 1 target each rd while sustained for up to 1 min; a target cannot be affected twice by a single casting (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +10 HP)
Insect Form (P3 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Medium bug with 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 30, +13 attack, +2 damage, low-light vision, +13 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 4th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, +16 attack, +6 damage, +16 Athletics; 5th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, +18 attack, +2 damage and double damage dice, +20 Athletics)
Jealous Hex (P1 Foc Nec): (1) R30' Inflicts enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, drained 1, or stupefied 1, based on the target's highest ability modifier, until the target saves or for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts condition level 2)
Jump (P1 Tra): (1) Allows self to jump 30' immediately (heightened 3rd affects touched, and effects last for 1 min)
Know Direction (PC1 Div): (2) Reveals which direction is north (heightened 7th reveals direction to a familiar location)
Light (PC1 Evo): (2) Touched object lights a 20' radius until next daily prep (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Lightning Bolt (P3 Evo): (2) 120' line inflicts 4d12 HP electricity (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Longstrider (P1 Tra): (2) Self gains +10' Speed for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last for 8 hr)
Magic Fang (P1 Tra): (2) Touched creature's unarmed attack gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min
Mariner's Curse (P5 Nec): (2) Touched suffers incurable sickened 1, plus slowed 1 on open water, until the curse is removed (save Will inflicts curable sickened 1; critical success negates; critical success inflicts incurable sickened 2)
Mask Of Terror (P7 Ill): (2) R30' Target inflicts frightened 2 for 1 rd on attackers for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure prevents attack) (heightened 8th affects 5 targets)
Massacre (P9 Nec): (2) 60' line inflicts 100 HP negative on creatures up to level 17 and kills those reduced to 0 HP; if none die, it inflicts an additional 30 negative on all within the line, including self (save Fortitude inflicts 9d6 HP; critical success negates; critical failure kills) (heightened 10th inflicts 115 HP (save Fortitude 10d6 HP) on creatures up to level 19)
Meld Into Stone (P3 Tra): (2) Allows self to enter a touched stone, retaining the ability to hear outside sounds, for 10 min
Mending (P1 Tra): (10 min) Restores 5 HP per spell level to a touched light, non-magical object (heightened 2nd can affect a 1 Bulk object; 3rd can affect a 2 Bulk or magical 1 Bulk object)
Meteor Swarm (P9 Evo): (2) R500' 4 meteors each inflict 6d10 HP bludgeoning in a 10' burst and 14d6 HP fire in a 40' burst (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP bludgeoning and +2d6 HP fire)
Moment Of Renewal (P8 Nec): (2) 6 touched instantly gain the effects of 24 hr of rest once per target per day
Monstrosity Form (P8 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Huge phoenix, purple worm, or sea serpent with 20 temporary HP, Armor Class 32, +28 attack, darkvision, +30 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific attacks for 1 min (heightened 9th gives 25 temporary HP, Armor Class 34, +31 attack, an additional damage die, +33 Athletics)
Moon Frenzy (P5 Tra): (2) R30' 5 willing targets gain 5 temporary HP, +10' Speed, fangs and claws that inflict 2d8 HP piercing and 2d6 HP slashing plus 1d4 HP persistent bleed on a critical hit, and increase a size up to Large in full moonlight, but suffer weakness 5 to silver and prohibition of non-rage, non-Seek concentration actions, for 1 min (heightened 6th gives 10 temporary HP, inflict 3d8 HP piercing and 3d6 HP slashing, weakness 10 to silver; 10th gives 20 temporary HP, inflict 4d8 HP piercing and 4d6 HP slashing, weakness 20 to silver)
Nature Incarnate (P10 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Medium green man or Gargantuan kaiju with 30 temporary HP, Armor Class 37, +34 attack, darkvision, +36 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific attacks for 1 min
Nature's Enmity (P9 Enc): (2) R120' 5 targets in a 500' burst suffer -10' Speed, attacks from animals that inflict 2d10 HP slashing and flat-footed for 1 rd (DC 8 flat negates; save basic Reflex), a required DC 5 flat check to cast primal spells, and hostility from bonded animals, fungi, and plants for 10 min
Negate Aroma (P1 Abj): (2) Negates the scent of a willing touched creature for 1 hr (heightened 5th R30' affects 10 targets)
Neutralize Poison (P3 Nec): (2) Makes a counteract check against 1 poison affecting touched
Nondetection (P3 Abj): (10 min) Touched gains automatic counteract attempts vs. magical divinations for 8 hr
Obscuring Mist (P2 Con): (3) R120' 20' burst conceals creatures for 1 min
Pass Without Trace (P1 Abj): (2) Increases the DC to Track self by 4 or to 29, whichever is higher, for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last for 8 hr; 4th effects last for 8 hr and affect a 20' radius and 10 creatures)
Passwall (P5 Con): (2) Creates a 5'x10'x10' tunnel in wood, plaster, or stone for 1 hr (heightened 7th the tunnel extends 20', appears as normal wall, and can be entered only using a password or trigger)
Pest Form (P1 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Tiny animal with Armor Class 27, 20' Speed, low-light vision, 30' imprecise scent, +10 Acrobatics and Stealth modifiers, -4 Athletics modifier, and weakness 5 to physical damage for 10 min (heightened 4th becomes a creature with a 20' fly Speed)
Phantom Steed (P2 Con): (10 min) R30' Conjures a magical mount (Armor Class 20, HP 10, 40' Speed) that can be ridden only by a designated creature for 8 hr (heightened 4th mount has 60' Speed and can move normally over water and natural difficult terrain; 5th mount can also Air Walk for 1 rd; 6th mount has 80' Speed and can fly)
Plane Shift (P7 Con): (10 min) Transports self and 8 willing targets to an imprecise location on a different plane
Plant Form (P5 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Large plant with 12 temporary HP, Armor Class 31, +17 attack, +11 damage, low-light vision, resistance 10 to poison, +19 Athletics modifier, and plant-specific attacks for 1 min (heightened 6th becomes a Huge plant with +5' reach, 24 temporary HP, Armor Class 34, +21 attack, +16 damage, +22 Athletics)
Polar Ray (P8 Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 10d8 HP cold, or double HP on a critical success, and drained 2 (heightened +1 inflicts +2d8 HP)
Prestidigitation (PC1 Evo): (2) R10' Performs cooking, lifting, making a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Primal Herd (P10 Tra): (2) R30' Self and 5 willing targets become Huge mammoths with 20 temporary HP, 40' Speed, low-light vision, Armor Class level + 22, a tusk attack that inflicts 4d8+19 HP piercing, a trunk attack that inflicts 4d6+16 HP bludgeoning, a foot attack that inflicts 4d6+13 HP bludgeoning, low-light vision, +30 Athletics modifier, and a trample action for 1 min
Primal Phenomenon (P10 Div): (3) Acts as Wish to reverse effects or produces effects similar to a known primal spell of up to 9th level or a common spell of up to 7th level
Primal Summons (P6 Foc Con): (F) Subsequent Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus gives summoned creature one of: a 60' fly Speed; a 20' burrow Speed, -10' Speed, and resistance 5 to physical damage; +1d6 HP fire damage, resistance 10 to fire, and weakness 5 to cold and water; a 60' swim Speed, a Shove after a melee attack, and resistance 5 to fire
Produce Flame (PC1 Evo): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d4+3 HP fire, or double HP plus 1d4 HP persistent fire on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP initial and persistent)
Punishing Winds (P8 Evo): (3) R100' 30' radius lowers flying creatures by 40', creates greater difficult terrain for flying creatures and difficult terrain for others, and requires a successful flying Acrobatics or grounded Athletics vs. DC 29 to exit while sustained for up to 1 min
Purify Food And Drink (P1 Nec): (2) Removes contaminates from 1 cubic foot of food or water
Purple Worm Sting (P6 Nec): (2) Touched suffers 3d6 HP piercing and stage 1 purple worm venom, which inflicts 3d6 HP poison and enfeebled 2; subsequent failures after 1 rd will inflict 4d6 HP and 6d6 HP at stage 2 and stage 3 (save Fortitude inflicts 3d6 HP piercing and 3d6 HP poison only; critical success inflicts 3d6 HP piercing only; critical failure inflicts stage 2 immediately)
Ray Of Frost (PC1 Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 1d4+3 HP cold (critical success inflicts double HP and -10 Speed for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Read Aura (PC1 Div): (1 min) R30' Reveals whether an object is magical and the related school of magic (heightened 3rd affects 10 targets; 6th affects unlimited targets)
Regenerate (P7 Nec): (2) Touched target regains 15 HP and regrows a damaged organ each rd for 1 min; suffering new acid or fire damage negates the effects for 1 rd (heightened 9th restores 20 HP each rd)
Remake (P10 Con): (1 hr) R5' Fully re-creates a known object up to 5'x5'x5' from a remnant
Remove Disease (P3 Nec): (10 min) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 disease affecting touched
Remove Fear (P2 Enc): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 fear effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Remove Paralysis (P2 Nec): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a paralysis effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Resist Energy (P2 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 vs. a specified energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
Restoration (P2 Nec): (1 min) Gives a 2-step reduction to a clumsy, enfeebled, or stupefied condition, a 1-step reduction to 2 of these conditions, or a 1-stage reduction to a toxin affecting touched (heightened 4th allows reducing a drained condition, lessening a toxin by 2 stages, or reducing a non-permanent doomed condition by 1; 6th allows reducing a permanent doomed condition by 1)
Restore Senses (P2 Nec): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a magical blindness or deafness effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Revival (P10 Nec): (2) 30' radius restores 10d8+40 HP to living targets and raises dead targets with the same number of temporary HP while sustained for up to 1 min
Searing Light (P3 Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 5d6 HP fire, plus 5d6 HP good to fiends and undead (critical success inflicts double HP), and attempts to counteract magical darkness (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP fire and good)
Shape Stone (P4 Tra): (2) Reshapes touched 10'x10'x10' stone
Shape Wood (P2 Tra): (2) Reshapes touched 20 cubic feet of wood
Shapechange (P9 Tra): (2) Replicates any known polymorph spell of up to 8th level for 1 min
Shatter (P2 Evo): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d10 HP sonic on an unattended object, ignoring Hardness up to 4 (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP and ignores +2 Hardness)
Shillelagh (P1 Tra): (2) Touched staff gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice (3 damage dice vs. aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead) for 1 min
Shocking Grasp (P1 Evo): (2) Touch inflicts 2d12 HP electricity; touching an armored target gives +1 attack and also inflicts 1d4 HP persistent electricity (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP initial and +1 HP persistent)
Shrink (P2 Tra): (2) R30' Willing target becomes Tiny for 5 min (heightened 6th affects 10 creatures)
Sigil (PC1 Tra): (2) Inscribes a 1" sq magical mark on a touched object or creature; the mark can be scrubbed off and fades from a creature after 1 week (heightened 3rd marks a creature for 1 month; 5th marks a creature for 1 year; 7th marks a creature permanently)
Slow (P3 Tra): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 2) (heightened 6th affects 10 targets)
Solid Fog (P4 Con): (3) R120' 20' burst conceals creatures and inflicts difficult terrain for 1 min
Speak With Animals (P2 Div): (2) Allows self to communicate with animals for 10 min
Speak With Plants (P4 Div): (2) Allows self to communicate with plants and fungi for 10 min
Spider Climb (P2 Tra): (2) Touched gains a climb Speed equal to its Speed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 1 hr)
Spider Sting (P1 Nec): (2) Touched suffers 1d4 HP piercing and stage 1 spider venom, which inflicts 1d4 HP poison and enfeebled 1; subsequent failures after 1 rd will inflict an additional 1d4 HP poison and enfeebled 2 at stage 2 (save Fortitude inflicts 1d4 HP piercing and 1d4 HP poison only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 2 immediately)
Stabilize (PC1 Nec): (2) R30' Removes dying condition from target
Status (P2 Div): (2) Reveals willing touched's direction, distance, and conditions until next daily prep (heightened 4th R10' affects 10 targets)
Stinking Cloud (P3 Con): (2) R120' 20' burst conceals creatures and inflicts sickened 1 and slowed 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts sickened 1 only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2 and slowed 1)
Stone To Flesh (P6 Tra): (2) Restores touched petrified creature or transforms a human-sized stone object into flesh
Stoneskin (P4 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 to non-adamantine physical damage for 20 min; each hit reduces the duration by 1 min (heightened 6th gives resistance 10; 8th gives resistance 15; 10th gives resistance 20)
Storm Lord (P9 Foc Evo): (2) 100' emanation produces a bolt of lighting that inflicts 10d6 HP electricity and deafened for 1 rd (save basic Reflex) each rd while sustained for up to 1 min, plus a choice of weather: calm; foggy (conceals); rainy (inflicts -2 Acrobatics and Perception); or windy (inflicts -4 ranged attacks and difficult terrain for flying)
Storm Of Vengeance (P9 Evo): (3) R800' 360' burst inflicts -4 ranged attacks, greater difficult terrain for flying, and a choice each rd of 4d8 HP acid (no save), 4d10 HP bludgeoning (save basic Fortitude), 7d6 HP electricity on 10 targets (save basic Reflex), difficult terrain and concealment, or deafened for 10 min (save Fortitude negates) while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 10th R2200' 1000' burst)
Stormwind Flight (P4 Foc Tra): (2) Self gains 25' fly Speed for 1 min (heightened 6th negates difficult terrain effects when flying against the wind)
Summon Animal (P1 Con): (3) R30' A level -1 animal appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Summon Elemental (P2 Con): (3) R30' A level 1 elemental appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Summon Fey (P1 Con): (3) R30' A level -1 fey appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Summon Giant (P5 Con): (3) R30' A level 5 giant appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Plant Or Fungus (P1 Con): (3) R30' A level -1 plant or fungus appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Sunburst (P7 Evo): (2) R500' 60' burst attempts to counteract magical darkness and inflicts 8d10 HP fire, plus 8d10 HP positive to undead (save Reflex inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP fire and positive)
Swamp Of Sloth (P3 Foc Con): (1) R120' 5' burst (2 or 3 actions give a 10' or 15' burst) inflicts difficult terrain and 1d6 HP poison for 1 min (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +2 increases radius by 5' and inflicts +1d6 HP)
Tanglefoot (PC1 Con): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts -10' Speed for 1 rd, plus immobilized for 1 rd on a critical success; a successful Escape negates (heightened 2nd effects last for 2 rd; 4th effects last for 1 min)
Tangling Creepers (P6 Con): (3) R500' 40' burst inflicts -10' Speed, and a successful unarmed attack immobilizes 1 target for 1 rd (a successful Escape negates), each rd for 10 min
Tempest Surge (P1 Foc Evo): (2) R30' Inflicts 1d12 HP electricity, clumsy 2 for 1 rd, and 1 HP persistent electricity (save basic Reflex inflicts initial HP only) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP initial and +1 HP persistent)
Tentacular Limbs (P1 Foc Tra): (1) Extends reach for touch spells and unarmed Strikes to 10' for 1 min; adding an action to touch spells extends reach to 20' (heightened +2 adding an action gives +10' touch spell reach)
Tree Shape (P2 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Large tree with Armor Class 20 for 8 hr
Tree Stride (P5 Con): (1 min) Transports self from an adjacent tree to another of the same species within 5 miles (heightened 6th transports 50 miles; 8th transports 500 miles; 9th transports anywhere on the planet)
True Seeing (P6 Div): (2) R60' Makes counteract checks to allow self to see through illusions and transmutations for 10 min
Undeath's Blessing (P1 Foc Nec): (1) Touched responds to Heal and Harm as an undead for 1 min, and Harm restores +2 Hit Points (save Will Heal and Harm have half effect for 1 rd; critical success negates) (heightened +1 Harm restores +2 Hit Points)
Unfettered Pack (P7 Abj): (2) R30' 10 targets ignore environmental difficult terrain and circumstance Speed penalties for 1 hr (heightened 9th targets ignore environmental greater difficult terrain)
Unusual Anatomy (P5 Foc Tra): (1) Self gains darkvision and resistance 10 to precision and critical damage and inflicts 2d6 HP acid on successful non-reach melee attackers for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +5 resistances and inflicts +1d6 HP)
Veil (P4 Ill): (2) R30' Makes 10 creatures appear as different, similar creatures for 1 hr (heightened 5th also disguises voices and scents; 7th targets can appear to be familiar individuals)
Ventriloquism (P1 Ill): (2) Allows self to project their voice up to 60' for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects last for 1 hr, allow changing voice quality, and require an active Perception to attempt to disbelieve)
Vital Beacon (P4 Nec): (1 min) Touch heals once each rd: 4d10 HP, 4d8 HP, 4d6 HP, then 4d4 HP, until expended or next daily prep (heightened +1 each touch restores +1 die)
Volcanic Eruption (P7 Evo): (2) R120' 5'x80' cylinder inflicts 14d6 HP fire, a 20' descent and difficult terrain on flying creatures, and -10' Speed and clumsy 1 until a successful escape (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP), and 3d6 HP fire to creatures within 5' (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP and +1d6 HP within 5')
Wall Of Fire (P4 Evo): (3) R120' 5'x60'x10' line or 10' radius ring inflicts 4d6 HP fire for 1 min (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Wall Of Ice (P5 Evo): (3) R120' Creates a 60'x10'x1' wall or a 10' radius hemisphere of opaque ice with Armor Class 10, Hardness 10, weakness to fire 15, and 40 HP per 10' section for 1 min; rubble from destruction inflicts 2d6 HP cold and difficult terrain (heightened +2 each section gains +10 HP, and rubble inflicts +1d6 HP)
Wall Of Stone (P5 Con): (3) R120' Creates a permanent 120'x20'x1" stone wall with Armor Class 10, Hardness 14, and 50 HP per 10' section; rubble from destruction inflicts difficult terrain (heightened +2 each section gains +15 HP)
Wall Of Thorns (P3 Con): (3) R60' Creates a 60'x10'x5' bramble wall with Armor Class 10, Hardness 10, and 20 HP per 10' section that inflicts difficult terrain and 3d4 HP piercing for 1 min (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP, and each section gains +5 HP)
Wall Of Wind (P3 Evo): (3) R120' Creates a 60'x30'x5' wind wall that blocks small ammunition, inflicts -2 attack on larger ammunition, inflicts difficult terrain, and blocks flying creatures for 1 min (save Fortitude (flying creature) allows passage as difficult terrain; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts a 10' push)
Water Breathing (P2 Tra): (1 min) R30' 5 targets can breathe water for 1 hr (heightened 3rd effects last for 8 hr; 4th effects last until next daily prep)
Water Walk (P2 Tra): (2) Touched can walk on liquids for 10 min (heightened 4th R30' affects 10 creatures, and effects last for 1 hr)
Weapon Storm (P4 Evo): (2) Weapon swing inflicts 4 dice of damage to every creature in a 30' cone or a 10' emanation (save Reflex inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and critical specialization effect) (heightened +1 inflicts +1 damage die)
Web (P2 Con): (3) R30' 10' burst inflicts difficult terrain and -10' Speed for 1 rd (save Reflex or Athletics negates for 1 action; critical success negates for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts immobilized for 1 rd or until a successful Escape; successful Athletics also clears squares upon leaving)
Wild Morph (P1 Foc Tra): (1) Self gains claws that inflict 1d6 HP slashing (requires Wild Shape), jaws that inflict 1d8 HP piercing (requires Insect Shape), resistance 5 to critical hits and precision damage (requires Elemental Shape), 10' reach (requires Plant Shape), or a 30' fly Speed (requires Soaring Shape) for 1 min (heightened 6th may choose 2 effects, claws also inflict 2d6 HP persistent bleed damage, and jaws also inflict 2d6 HP persistent poison damage; 10th may choose 3 effects, claws also inflict 4d6 persistent bleed damage and jaws also inflict 4d6 HP persistent poison damage)
Wild Shape (P1 Foc Tra): (2) Transforms self into a Pest Form creature for 10 min or another creature for 1 min, gaining +2 attacks (heightened 2nd may transform into an Animal Form creature)
Wind Walk (P8 Tra): (10 min) Self and 5 touched become clouds that can move 20 MPH for 8 hr; attacking or spellcasting ends the spell
You're Mine (P5 Foc Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts stunned 1 for 1 rd and allows self to direct 1 target action (save Will inflicts stunned only; critical success negates; critical failure gives control for 1 rd) (heightened 7th gives control for 1 rd; critical failure gives control for 1 min or until the target succeeds on a save at the end of each turn)
Magic Notes:
Druidic Order: Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Primal)
Fey Caller: Knows the Illusory Disguise, Illusory Object, Illusory Scene, and Veil primal spells
Leaf: Knows the Goodberry primal spell
Call Of The Wild: Can spend 10 min to replace a prepared spell with Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus of the same level
Overwhelming Energy: (1) Subsequent spell ignores resistance 12 to energy
Primal Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the primal tradition
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
